name: Holiday Inn Los Angeles - LAX Airport
address: 9901 South La Cienega Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Experience our completely re-imagined hotel with brand new contemporary guest rooms, a new open concept Lobby, and upgraded 250mbps high-speed internet throughout for faster service, perfect for connecting with friends and business professionals. Enjoy American cuisine at Taste LA, our on-site restaurant, or try cocktails, appetizers, and entrees at The Spot E-Bar. Located a mile from LAX Airport via a complimentary 24-hour shuttle, our hotel is within proximity to SoFi Stadium, Silicon Beach, Aerospace Defense Industries, Corporate Offices, and major Universities. Other nearby attractions include SoFi Stadium, Kia Forum, Intuit Dome, YouTube Theater, Hollywood Park, and the Chargers Practice Field in El Segundo. Need a place to collaborate? Meet in one of our event rooms totaling 2,833 square feet. We will ensure your small to mid-scale meetings are a success. Book and enjoy many of Southern California’s attractions, including warm beaches and upscale shopping just minutes away.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: La Crystal Hotel
description: Offering a casino, an outdoor pool and a fitness center, LA Crystal Hotel -Los Angeles-Long Beach Area is located 11 mi away from Los Angeles International Airport. All guest rooms include free WiFi access. A flat-screen cable TV and a refrigerator are included in each room air-conditioned room at this hotel. Guests can request kettle in the room. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer, a mini refrigerator, and free toiletries. At LA Crystal Hotel -Los Angeles-Long Beach Area you will find a hot tub and a 24-hour reception. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage, car hire services and vending machines featuring snacks and drinks. The property offers free parking and an on-site bar. Long Beach and LAX are both less than 20 minutes' drive from the property. Downtown Los Angeles is 17 mi away, while Disneyland is 19 mi from the property.

name: Holiday Inn Express Hollywood Walk of Fame, an IHG Hotel
address: 1921 North Highland Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90068
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Hollywood Walk of Fame! The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Hollywood Walk of Fame offers a superb location near the most popular Hollywood theme parks and attractions. We’re also conveniently located to Hollywood Walk of Fame, Hollywood Bowl, Universal Studios, Paramount Studios, Sunset Strip, Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills, Bel Aire, Santa Monica and Venice Beach. Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Hollywood Walk of Fame near the LAX airport is just 20 min from the LA Convention Center and in close proximity to LA Business District, the Century City Business District, ABC, NBC, the Warner Center and CNN. Begin your day with our complimentary hot Express Start® breakfast bar and relax in our outdoor heated pool when you come home in the evening. You'll feel like Hollywood royalty in our hip lobby while making your way to your brand new room, complete with the luxurious Simply Smart bed and high-speed internet access.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Seaway Motel
description: Seaway Motel is located in Los Angeles, 2.5 miles from Petersen Automotive Museum and 2.7 miles from Los Angeles County Museum Of Art (LACMA). The property is around 6.6 miles from Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County, 6.9 miles from Dolby Theater and 7.3 miles from LA Memorial Coliseum. The property has room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the motel also have free WiFi. At Seaway Motel all rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Capitol Records Building is 7.3 miles from the accommodation, while California Science Center is 7.4 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 8.7 miles from Seaway Motel.

name: Best Western PLUS Gardena Inn & Suites
description: We are located five miles away from SoFi Stadium home of the Los Angeles Rams. Come visit the city of Gardena located in sunny Los Angeles California. Best Western Plus Gardena Inn & Suites lets you explore the city of Los Angeles just like a local with our location near LAX airport, the Pacific Ocean, the famously filmed downtown and an array of eclectic restaurants and distilleries. Meeting the demand of the bustling city of Los Angeles, Best Western Plus Gardena Inn & Suites boasts contemporary accommodations, meeting spaces and a full hot American breakfast. We make it a priority to accommodate your every need. Best Western Plus Gardena Inn & Suites is located next to many attractions including all the beach cities from Redondo Beach, Manhattan Beach and Santa Monica Pier. We are near many of the prime locations Los Angeles has to offer from Hollywood to Universal Studios, Beverly Hills to downtown Los Angeles and more. We are also just a short ride away from the new home of the LA Rams & Chargers who will be playing games at the brand new SoFi Staduim. Make a reservation at the Best Western Plus Gardena Inn & Suites and see everything the city of Los Angeles has to offer.bestwestern.com
